entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 08:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -15.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -18.8°C
Wind: SSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 1.
